settings.text:
Founded in 2008 by Jeff Rudes and Margaret Maldonado, L’AGENCE began with early roots in Hollywood and a devout following of high-profile celebrities and their stylists. Informed by the easy chic feel of Southern California with a Parisian sensibility, the collections evoke a spirit of sultry glamour through vibrant colors, bold prints, and timeless silhouettes that complement the jet-setter lifestyle. We create a head-to-toe wardrobe for every aspect of the day, that chameleons from airport to gala, beachside to boardroom. All the elements of the look are designed in conjunction so that the pieces work symbiotically.

 

Our brand is built on community, a culture of empowerment, and a commitment to taking care of our people. Our signature styles inspire a deep level of trust among editors, IT girls, and top celebrities, and our noteworthy events build a sense of loyalty within our influencer network. L’AGENCE is carried in approximately 300 stores in the US and Canada by major retailers such as Bergdorf Goodman, Neiman Marcus, and Saks Fifth Avenue.

settings.title: Our History
settings.text:
L’AGENCE embodies the mergence of the Los Angeles effortless lifestyle with an understated Parisian influence. Since the brand’s inception in 2008, the California-based label has maintained its identity while using luxury fabrics and modern designs to produce timeless ready-to-wear for women.

In 2015, L’AGENCE launched their denim assortment combining style, cut and fit.

L'AGENCE continues to perfect its voice among the fashion influencers, providing women with a feminine versatile wardrobe that helps her elevate her personal style. It's a label that caters to the chic and elegant jet-setter. Producing 12 collections a year, L'AGENCE is available in approximately 300 doors in the US with major retailers such as Intermix, Bergdorf Goodman, Saks Fifth Avenue and Nordstrom, Selfridges, and Harrods.

Known for its easy-to-wear wardrobe staples and relevant fashion looks, L’AGENCE has garnered a vast celebrity following ranging from Hollywood darlings to young starlets. Brand ambassadors include Angelina Jolie, Charlize Theron, Cindy Crawford, Emma Roberts, Karlie Kloss, Kate Beckinsale, Jennifer Lopez, Kaia Gerber, Lilly Collins, Demi Lovato, Ashley Graham, and Scarlet Johansson to name a few.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text:
Designing to inspire your life. A California lifestyle, with a French attitude.

We are committed to timeless products that earn and retain customer loyalty.

Our philosophy is to inspire leadership that empowers our team and develops our next generation of leaders.

settings.title: Careers
settings.text:
If you are interested in a career with L'AGENCE, please send your resume to
careers@lagence.com for consideration.
